content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Joo Koon" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(July 2009)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*Subzone of Pioneer Planning Area in Singapore **Joo Koon** (裕群) is an industrial estate in [Jurong](/wiki/Jurong) of the [West Region](/wiki/West_Region,_Singapore) of [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). East of Joo Koon is [Lok Yang](/wiki/Lok_Yang) and South is [Gul](/wiki/Gul,_Singapore). Joo Koon consists mostly of factories. It is bounded by Upper Jurong Road, the [Pan Island Expressway](/wiki/Pan_Island_Expressway), Jalan Ahmad Ibrahim and Benoi Road. ## Amenities and landmarks Surrounding Joo Koon industrial town are [Pasir Laba Camp](/wiki/Pasir_Laba_Camp), [SISPEC](/wiki/SISPEC), [SAFTI](/wiki/SAFTI_Military_Institute), Jurong Camp, [Singapore Discovery Centre](/wiki/Singapore_Discovery_Centre) and Arena Country Club. There is a food centre located along Joo Koon Way. There is also a [NTUC FairPrice](/wiki/NTUC_FairPrice) Warehouse Club, office units all comes under one roof at FairPrice Hub Joo Koon, which is the town hub. ## Residential There is a dormitory called Jurong Apartments located near Joo Koon MRT Station. ## Transportation [Joo Koon MRT station](/wiki/Joo_Koon_MRT_station) is located at Joo Koon Circle in the eastern side of the industrial estate. Joo Koon Bus Interchange was opened on 21 November 2015. ## Neighbouring areas This [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) location article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Joo Koon
